Question: Miles Dewey **** III (May 26, 1926 – September 28, 1991) was an American jazz musician, trumpeter, bandleader, and composer.
Hints: By the end of the summer, this person had persuaded Wayne Shorter to leave Art Blakey's Jazz Messengers and join the quintet.
His father, Miles Henry ****, was a dentist.
This person was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2006.
